sentences: "On ikka kallimeelseid inimesi maailmas veel olemas, kaugeltki mõtlevad teiste peale," ohkas Miina.
Sel juhul oleks see mõisniku poolt suur ja kallimeelne tegu, kui ta armupalujaid tagasi ei tõrjuks.
context: The word 'mõtlevad' is the 3rd person plural present form of the Estonian verb 'mõtlema', which means 'to think'. It refers to a group of people who are thinking or considering something. In the provided context sentences, it describes people who consider others and have thoughtful attitudes.
